yaml.title: NSC-R Tidy Tuesday
yaml.description: Improve your R skills in entertaining, inspiring and supportive sessions moderated by your own colleagues.
yaml.author: Alex Trinidad

markdown.markdown:
![](Screenshot.PNG)

The NSC-R Tidy Tuesday workshop sessions are inspired by the [Tidy Tuesday](https://www.tidytuesday.com/) initiative, which was aimed at providing a safe and supportive forum for individuals to practice their data processing and visualization skills in R while working with real-world data.

Join this workshop meeting on Zoom by clicking [this link](https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84912367177?pwd=cElFYmZ4ckNidSs4QzdvdUQ4M2tlUT09)

The [dataset](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/tree/master/data/2021/2021-06-29) for this Tidy Tuesday is about animal rescues! [Alex Trinidad](https://twitter.com/atrinidad_psi) explores the temporal trends of animal rescues using lubridate package (Grolemund & Wickham, 2011).


-   The [script (R)](https://uni-koeln.sciebo.de/s/si6tjDuWIOIm0tF) that Alex worked through.
-   The CRAN [documentation](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/lubridate/lubridate.pdf).
-   About [lubridate](https://lubridate.tidyverse.org/).

[Alex Trinidad](https://twitter.com/atrinidad_psi)

### Citation

For attribution, please cite this work as [@trinidad_nsc-r_nodate]
